benchmark_details.name: PerInstruct
benchmark_details.overview: PerInstruct is a novel benchmark composed of personalized instructions spanning diverse daily scenarios, specifically designed to evaluate the personalization capabilities of VLM-based mobile agents.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the personalization capabilities of VLM-based mobile agents.

data.source: Human-annotated dataset constructed from authentic user-generated requests and LLM-based generation.

methodology.calculation: Measurements of success rates, element perception accuracy, and exploration accuracy.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in handling personalized instructions.
methodology.baseline_results: UI-TARS improved success rates from 12.0% to 68.0%; MobileAgent from 9.3% to 49.3%; AppAgent from 10.7% to 46.7%.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments conducted across multiple mobile agents.
